entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 03:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %

Wind: SSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
